import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FC } from "react"; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import { PersonalInfo } from '../../api/domain/personal-info'; import { Gender } from "../../api/domain"; export interface PersonalInfoFormProps { personalInfo: PersonalInfo; } export const PersonalInfoForm: FC = ({personalInfo}) => { const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(personalInfo.lastName); const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(personalInfo.firstName); const [middleName, setMiddleName] = useState(personalInfo.middleName); const [birthDate, setBirthDate] = useState(personalInfo.birthDate); const [gender, setGender] = useState(personalInfo.gender); return( <>
